title: Bureaucracy help, hinder policy in auth. regimes

content.question: Describe one feature of a bureaucracy in the context of an authoritarian system. Explain how that feature you have described can both help and hinder the effective implementation of public policy in an authoritarian system.

frqParts.text: Describe one feature of a bureaucracy in the context of an authoritarian system. Explain how that feature you have described can both help and hinder the effective implementation of public policy in an authoritarian system.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
